Read book
Go to the bedroom. Grab the book out of the nightstand. Lay down in bed. Open the book. Read the book.


[WALK] <bedroom> (1.67)
[WALK] <nightstand> (1.100)
[FIND] <nightstand> (1.100)
[OPEN] <nightstand> (1.100)
[FIND] <novel> (1.1000)
[GRAB] <novel> (1.1000)
[FIND] <bed> (1.105)
[TURNTO] <bed> (1.105)
[SIT] <bed> (1.105)
[READ] <novel> (1.1000)
